Title: Rôti
Plot: When Dr. Gideon escapes from police custody, he seeks to kill psychiatrists who have profiled him. Will and the BAU team try to track him down by following Freddie Lounds' blog before Gideon can get to Alana. Hannibal misleads the BAU team in order to put Will in the same room as Gideon, and Jack questions Dr. Chilton regarding Gideon's escape.
Writer: Steve Lightfoot, Bryan Fuller, Scott Nimerfro
GuestStars: Eddie Izzard, Raúl Esparza, Scott Thompson, Aaron Abrams, Lara Jean Chorostecki, Gillian Anderson
